narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during the 1st pre license inspection. 
 
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the owner. 
The applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class A breeder.
Licensee fee may be sent to : 
USDA APHIS Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. Building B Mail Stop 3 W 11 
Ft. Collins, Co 80526 
** No regulated activity to be conducted until USDA license has been issued. **
